top.title: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
top.summary: Russia has not confirmed it agreed to Trump's request, but Ukraine's president said he expected Vladimir Putin's promise to be kept.

top.title: Agents in Minneapolis could be pulled back if local officials cooperate, border tsar says
top.summary: Tom Homan said the immigration operation would be more "targeted", as the Trump administration works to calm frustrations both in the city and on Capitol Hill

top.title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
top.summary: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

top.title: Apple reports best-ever iPhone sales as Mac dips
top.summary: The company's revenue was boosted by iPhone sales, but sales of its wearable tech and Mac computers dipped.

top.title: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns
top.summary: The ASA upheld complaints that Coinbase's adverts trivialised the risks of investing in cryptocurrency.

top.title: Driverless taxis set to launch in UK as soon as September
top.summary: Waymo has laid out plans for a robotaxi service in London with a pilot scheme due to begin in April.

title.#text: It’s a new heyday for gas thanks to data centers
Apple just had a record-breaking iPhone quarter
The weirdest headphones at CES will launch on Kickstarter next month
